# activate()

**Instance Method**

Activates an inactive listener.

## Declaration

```swift
func activate() throws
```

## Discussion

If you create an inactive listener using the [doc://com.apple.xpc/documentation/XPC/XPCListener/InitializationOptions/inactive] flag, be sure to activate it before releasing the last reference to the listener. Releasing the last reference to an inactive listener crashes.

If activation fails, the system automatically cancels the listener.

## Managing the life cycle

- **cancel()**: Cancels a listener.
title: activate()
